name: ScheduledJob
doc: Describe what has been scheduled for ETL

fields.name: et_status
fields.doc: could be one of SCHEDULED, RUNNING, ERROR, SUCCESS, COMPLETE, empty

fields.name: load_status
fields.doc: could be one of SCHEDULED, RUNNING, ERROR, SUCCESS, COMPLETE, empty

fields.name: delete_requested
fields.doc: anything other than None or 0 means delete_requested is True

fields.name: delete_requested_put_at
fields.doc: ISO 8601 timestamp on when delete_requested is put in UTC

fields.name: cancel_requested
fields.doc: anything other than None or 0 means cancel_requested is True

fields.name: cancel_requested_put_at
fields.doc: ISO 8601 timestamp on when cancel_requested is put in UTC

fields.name: pause_requested
fields.doc: anything other than None or 0 means pause_requested is True

fields.name: pause_requested_put_at
fields.doc: ISO 8601 timestamp on when pause_requested is put in UTC

fields.name: et_num_error_retries
fields.doc: number of retries attempted so far

fields.name: et_next_error_retry_attempt
fields.doc: ISO 8601 timestamp on when next retry attempt will be made

fields.name: load_num_error_retries
fields.doc: number of retries attempted so far

fields.name: load_next_error_retry_attempt
fields.doc: ISO 8601 timestamp on when next retry attempt will be made

fields.name: et_status_last_updated_at
fields.doc: ISO 8601 timestamp on when the et_status is last updated

fields.name: load_status_last_updated_at
fields.doc: ISO 8601 timestamp on when load_status is last updated

fields.name: et_last_successful_date
fields.doc: Last data_date successfully ET, in YYYY/MM/DD

fields.name: load_last_successful_date
fields.doc: Last data_date successfully loaded, in YYYY/MM/DD

fields.name: time_log_need_to_be_available
fields.doc: input by user, the time from 00:00 until log of that date is available, eg: 48:00

fields.name: start_date
fields.doc: start date in YYYY/MM/DD

fields.name: end_date
fields.doc: end date inclusive in YYYY/MM/DD

fields.name: log_name
fields.doc: usually the scribe log name

fields.name: description
fields.doc: describe the purpose of this job

fields.name: log_schema_version
fields.doc: log schema version

fields.name: log_format
fields.doc: format of the log, like json

fields.name: s3_path
fields.doc: s3 path

fields.name: contact_emails
fields.doc: array of emails who are responsible for the scheduled job. Each element is an individual email string.

fields.name: redshift_id
fields.doc: unique identifier of redshift cluster

fields.name: hash_key
fields.doc: The value of hash key of the record stored inside DynamoDB. Currently this is <redshift_id>:<log_name>:<log_schema_version>:<start_date>:<end_date>

fields.name: uuid
fields.doc: a reference to a job without using a hash_key

fields.name: additional_arguments
fields.doc: a json string of additional arguments used by the s3 to redshift pipeline
